snippet: The electronics retailer said its lenders had not agreed to a plan to close 1,100 stores, raising doubts about its turnaround and sending shares down 7 percent on Thursday.
abstract: RadioShack says its lenders have not agreed to plan to close 1,100 stores, raising doubts about its turnaround and sending shares down 7 percent.
lead_paragraph: The electronics retailer said its lenders had not agreed to a plan to close 1,100 stores, raising doubts about its turnaround and sending shares down 7 percent on Thursday.

headline.main: Radioshack’s Creditors Stymie Plan to Shutter Stores
headline.print_headline: Radioshack’s Creditors Stymie Plan to Shutter Stores
